TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WrapIndent extends DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Math.TwipsMeasureType

summary.para: This class is available in Office 2007 or above.
When the object is serialized out as xml, it's qualified name is m:wrapIndent.

remarks.format:
## Remarks [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlnoticeiso.md)] **wrapIndent (Wrap Indent)** This element specifies the indent of the wrapped line of an instance of mathematical text. The line or lines of a wrapped instance of mathematical text after the line break can either be indented by a specified amount from the left margin, or right aligned. The default indent is 1". In other words, whether the element is absent or present without the val attribute, the default of the val attribute is *1440* twips (or 1 inch). [*Example*: The XML below demonstrates wrapIndent in use: ```xml ``` *end example*] |Parent Elements| |---------------------| |mathPr (§22.1.2.62)| |Attributes|Description| |----------------|-----------------| |val (Value)|Specifies the value, in twips, of the parent element.

The possible values for this attribute are defined by the *ST_TwipsMeasure* simple type (§22.9.2.14).| [*Note*: The W3C XML Schema definition of this element’s content model (CT_TwipsMeasure) is located in §A.6.1. *end note*] [!INCLUDE[openxmlnoticeiso](~/includes/openxmlcopyrightiso.md)]
